description: A biweekly seminar for Dove doctoral advisees and students in the combined F&ES/Anthropology doctoral program. Presentation and discussion of dissertation prospectuses and proposals, dissertation chapters, and related publications; collaborative writing and publishing projects on subjects of common interest; and discussion of such topics as grantsmanship, data analysis, writing and publishing, and the job search. Two and one-half hour seminar.
